name: Vera Verba (nast .: Gertruda Petrovna Sokolova)
birthPlace: Village Vysokiy Gorodets, Tolochinsky District, Vitebsk Region, BSSR, USSR

timelineData.text: In 1958, V. Verba graduated from high school in Minsk and entered the philological faculty of the BSU, which she graduated in 1964.
Since 1964 - Member of the Union of Writers of the USSR.
She worked as a freelance correspondent for the magazine «Youth».
She worked as a senior inspector of the literature propaganda department of the Book Trade Department of the State Committee for Press under the Council of Ministers of the BSSR.
Since 1972 - literary worker, then head of the department of letters and information of the editorial office of the newspaper «Literature and Masters”.
Since 1977 - freelance correspondent for the magazine Worker and Peasant.

work.title: Has translated into Belarusian the book «Wild Dog Dingo, or the Story of First Love» by R. Fraerman
A collection of poetry «My little planet»
The book of selected poetry «Last September»
